column3:
Additional suggested improvements:

https://github.com/RandyMcMillan/bitcoin-core/blob/gunar-patch-1/doc/init.md
Suggestions merged and commits squashed. Thank you.

ACK dcab5e813348e4a01517a99e129c0a27e6224298

For next time, when you make changes aimed at formatting on the website: it's useful if you link to the rendered documents so people can easily compare. E.g.

Before: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/a2a03c3ca94b1cdd279ac09f2a81e04d262586fd/doc/init.md#paths
After: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/dcab5e813348e4a01517a99e129c0a2

ACK e1604b3d50dca3291a432be59cfd03c0e846e7b2

This commit renders cleanly on gh-flavored md and @MacDownApp 

build-unix.md [before](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/ae749d12ddbaf592fbdb65d98ca35a0ff5566992/doc/build-osx.md)
build-unix.md [after](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/e1604b3d50dca3291a432be59cfd03c0e846e7b2/doc/build-unix.md)

init.md [before](https://github

Binary:              /usr/bin/bitcoind
	Configuration file:  /etc/bitcoin/bitcoin.conf
	Data directory:      /var/lib/bitcoind
	PID file:            /var/run/bitcoind/bitcoind.pid (OpenRC and Upstart) or
                         /run/bitcoind/bitcoind.pip (systemd)
	Lock file:           /var/lock/subsys/bitcoind (CentOS)
I recommend 4 spaces for indenting.
I disagree - I wish more people reviewed documentation and submitted improvements.\nThis should be encouraged.

This is the formatting I'm looking to fix (below). It's indeed my first contribution albeit small. Looking forward to making more meaningful ones as I get more comfortable with the codebase.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7684574/106794252-77e75c00-6650-11eb-828c-fbe3df8be60f.png)

I have linked to some suggested changes -> 

> Additional suggested improvements:
> 
> https://github.com/RandyMcMillan/bitcoin-core/blob/gunar-patch-1/doc/init.md

add those..
@gunar :+1: I think there should be more changes than just adding spaces. At least write something..
What is the point of mixing tabs and spaces? Why is the file extension changed to pip?
Why is this changed?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7684574/106870731-59717700-66c9-11eb-8104-db8339038f3e.png)\n
That is a screenshot of the rendered changes of the second hunk. The first hunk (`contrib/init`) renders fine already.

The file extension change was a typo. Fixed now.\n\nMixing tabs and spaces is what https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/tor.md#L24-L27 does. Do you think we should change it everywhere?
My badâ€”this is for tabs/spaces inconsistency consistency. Happy to go one way or the other.\n\nRe: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21075#discussion_r570063070
Yes, please don't use tabs. If it wasn't clear yet, we use spaces for indentation only in this project.

Cool, thanks for the info. I've just replaced tabs for spaces in all other `doc/*.md` files too: [`e1604b3` (#21075)](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21075/commits/e1604b3d50dca3291a432be59cfd03c0e846e7b2)
Why were all of these changed, rather than only the lines with tabs?\n\nFWIW I proposed to do just that in this file a few months ago and was asked not to because it was unnecessary churn.
:man_shrugging:
